short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generates a list of random names of various themes and categories; useful for GMs and players of TTRPGS.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Has this ever happened to you or a GM you know?

"The guard ushers you past the door into theâ€”"
"I ask the guard what his mother's name is."

Chances are this piece of world-shattering lore didn't make it into the planning session. But now we can *pretend* it did with a quick click of a button. Name Generator Extension is for these moments. 

Name Generator Extension generates a list of random names of various themes and categories perfect for players and game masters of tabletop role-playing games. Customize your name generation preferences so the perfect name for your random NPC is available at just one click. NGE can also be used off-line after installation, with internet connectivity only necessary for future updates. 

NGE is an open-source project available on GitHub: https://github.com/trevclaridge/Name-Generator-Extension
